channel.title: Crashing in Surface Tension
channel.description:
Hi folks,
Black Mesa crashed two times in the same spot when shooting the same trip mine. On the third try it didn't crash again. But when I switched windows(borderless) to look at another screen, the game crashed in the same spot. I don't know if the two kind of crashes are related.
I would like to attach dumpfiles, but it seem like I'm not authorized to upload files... https://imgur.com/a/OPHy7a1

item.title: Crashing in Surface Tension
item.dc:creator: aredic
item.description:
Hi folks,

Black Mesa crashed two times in the same spot when shooting the same trip mine. On the third try it didn’t crash again. But when I switched windows(borderless) to look at another screen, the game crashed in the same spot. I don’t know if the two kind of crashes are related.

I would like to attach dumpfiles, but it seem like I’m not authorized to upload files…

[Album] Black Mesa - Surface Tension Crash location
